name: Sub to Mint Simulator
description:
Mint Fantôme is a ghost maid vtuber who debuted on July 18, 2020. She announced that on April 3, 2021, her soul would be ascending to heaven, and thus she would not be able to continue her vtuber activities.

This game is a present to Mint to thank her for all the smiles she's given me. It is a small physics sandbox where your objective is to use the computer to subscribe to Mint's channel. The game has many references to Mint's past streams, inside jokes, and fanart from other members of the community.
